DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Trial Evaluate Corifollitropin Alfa ( Org 36286 ) , Followed Low Daily Dose hCG Recombinant FSH Can Induce Monofollicular Growth Women With WHO Group II Anovulatory Infertility ( P05693 )
DOC.detailed_description: This trial include two separate stage ( Ia+Ib II ) . Stage Ia open-label uncontrolled small cohort woman ( n=5 ) explore whether intended dose regimen corifollitropin alfa follow daily low dose recFSH provide appropriate response eligible participant meet inclusion none exclusion criterion . Stage Ib open-label uncontrolled small cohort woman ( n=5 ) explore whether intended dose regimen corifollitropin alfa follow daily low dose hCG provide appropriate response eligible participant meet inclusion none exclusion criterion . Stage II open-label randomized ( n=40 ) evaluate whether intend dose regimen corifollitropin alfa follow low dose FSH ( n=20 ) hCG ( n=20 ) provide appropriate response eligible participant meet inclusion none exclusion criterion .
